comments:
Eclipse V3 build 200406251208
EMF build 200406250129 (see bug 69695 if using later EMF)
UML2 build 200406281334

error has occurred. See error log for more details"

This is a bug in the Editor.javajet template (see 
https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=69384). Once the fix is 
available in EMF, the editor for UML2 will be regenerated.
Fixed as of UML2 build M200407211153.
